timeline.author: MikeDombo
MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: This fails on Github runner since fu.get() can throw an InterruptedException as well as an ExecutionException. It's also not testing RetryUtils, it's testing Java behavior..
replies.author: jbutler

replies.bodyText: How could it possibly be different on github compared to ec2?
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: The .get should not be getting interrupted because it is running in the main test thread, which isn't interrupted
replies.author: MikeDombo
